title: Very Bold Sans Serif
content:
At first I thought this was FUTURA, but the "R" is wrong.  
.. not Avante Garde or Gotham either...

Ignoring the patterns, what do you think this is?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418190534im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1%20bold%20type%20with%20patterns%20and%20vibrancy_6549.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418190534im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1%20colour%20and%20feel_4659.jpg)
author: scarchord
